data.title: Da’an District, Taipei City Vacation Rentals
meta_keywords: Essentials (towels bed sheets soap and toilet paper)
data.meta_description: Lowest Price Results - Sophisticated Taipei 1min to MRT, 1min to 7-11 is a vacation rental located in Da’an District, Taipei City. This Private Room can...
data.text: Welcome to our suite featuring a double bed, a private toilet, and a serene atmosphere. Please note, there's no street-facing window, ensuring peace and quiet. Located in the heart of Taipei's vibrant district, our building offers a lively experience right outside your door. No indoor smoking, valid IDs required, and quiet hours are enforced. We encourage eco-friendly stays; kindly bring personal toiletries. Your comfort is our top priority. This elegant building is located in the heart of Taipei, boasting an exceptional geographical position. This area is one of Taipei's busiest commercial districts, offering convenient transportation with close proximity to the subway system and numerous bus routes, surrounded by high-end department stores and a diverse array of dining options. During the day, you can explore chic boutiques and renowned brands, while at night, the area transforms into a bustling night market, with street vendors calling out and music filling the air. Regardless of your taste preferences, you can find satisfaction in the nearby cafes and restaurants. The interior decor is modern and elegant, allowing you to relax and enjoy your time. To ensure your safety, we strictly adhere to hygiene standards, performing 75% alcohol disinfection before and after your stay. Rest assured, this suite is located within a building, complete with a dedicated doorman and convenient elevator service — there are no shared spaces here. Experience the highest standard of urban living in the bustling city of Taipei, where every moment marks the beginning of a beautiful memory. Please note that for any mail or packages received on your behalf during your stay, a handling fee of USD $50 will be charged per item. This is to cover the costs associated with mail reception and storage. Additionally, for the safety and security of all our guests, we will open and inspect all received items. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in maintaining a secure environment for everyone. Central Comfort in Taipei City Center! ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ 1-Min Stroll to Zhongxiao Dunhua MRT 24hr Eslite Bookstore Nearby Convenience at Your Door: 24hr Store & Supermarket Peaceful Stay: Great Soundproofing In-Room Amenities: Hairdryer, Cable TV, Free WiFi Provided Essentials: Towels, Shampoo, Body Wash, etc Travel Light - Your Home in Taipei Awaits Elevator Access in Lift Apartment Prime Location for Kong Hot Pot (Authentic HK-Style, Delicious Pork Bone Broth!) 10 minutes to Beautiful Era (Dreamy Dessert: Pearl Milk Tea Pancake Tart) 10 minutes to Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall 10 minutes to COURONNE Junhe (Elegant Afternoon Tea, French Delights) Within 5 minutes, you'll find around 500 restaurants and café shops to explore. *Taiwanese guests: Inquire and provide info before booking due to regulations. All guests must verify with ID and business card. No parties, noise, smoking ($5000TWD fine). No visitors ($1000TWD per visitor). We're "green accommodation"! Support environmental efforts. No disposable items (toothbrush, razor, etc.). If you are seeking a perfectly quiet retreat, please note that due to our central location in a bustling area of the city, our accommodation may not provide the level of tranquility you desire.
